javadoc:
A component that acts like a label, but adds the ability to render HTML anchors and the ability for clients to add anchor handlers.

When given HTML content (a String that starts with <HTML>) and anchor tags (<a href="callback_name">a hyper link<a>), this component will display the hyperlinks properly and will notify any registered listeners ({@link #addHyperlinkListener(String, HyperlinkListener)} that the user has clicked the link by the given name.

methods.name: addHyperlinkListener
methods.comment: Add a listener that will be called whenever hyperlink updates happen (hover, activate, etc).

params.name: anchorName
params.comment: The value in the href attribute of the anchor tag.

params.name: listener
params.comment:
The listener to be called when the anchor(s) with a matching href is
        manipulated by the user.

name: HyperlinkComponent
comment:
A component that acts like a label, but adds the ability to render HTML anchors and the 
 ability for clients to add anchor handlers.
 
 When given HTML content (a String that 
 starts with HTML) and anchor tags (a href="callback_name"a hyper linka),
 this component will display the hyperlinks properly and will notify any registered 
 listeners (#addHyperlinkListener(String, HyperlinkListener) that the user has clicked the link
 by the given name.
